import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { IStats } from 'src/app/interfaces/IStats'; @Component({ selector: 'app-stats', templateUrl: './stats.component.html', styleUrls: ['./stats.component.scss'] }) export class StatsComponent implements OnInit { @Input() stats: IStats = { totalOfCards: 0, numberOfDecks: 0, numberOfCardsSelected: 0 }; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} }
Total of Cards

{{ stats.totalOfCards }}

Number of Decks

0

Number of Cards Selected

{{ stats.numberOfCardsSelected }}
